resolutions.name: Use AMD card driver
resolutions.description: Closed source driver will only be used in special needs. Driver will auto determine the acceleration mode of AMD graphics card without external configuration.

resolutions.name: Use SNA to acceleration mode
resolutions.description: Can speed up the graphics card with better performance, unstable in some graphics cards with screen splash after tested

resolutions.name: Use UXA acceleration mode
resolutions.description: A more ancient and mature acceleration mode with the best compatibility can support all Intel graphics cards to achieve acceleration, but the performance is relatively weak .

resolutions.name: No NVIDIA card driver
resolutions.description: NVIDIA card driver is not detected in the current environment, and will be in gray

resolutions.name: Use open source driver nouveau
resolutions.description: It's derived by analyzing the nvidia closed source driver with weaker performance and unstable in some graphics cards.

resolutions.name: Use closed source driver nvidia
resolutions.description: Only adaptive to parts of distributions and graphics cards, so black screen resulted from incompatible version and unsupporterd graphics card will be occurred.
